name: Boxing At The Movies Trivia Game | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: This 1931 film was directed by King Vidor and starred Wallace Beery and Jackie Cooper. What was it called?
questions.explanation:
The Champ.

	This classic movie tells the story of an alcoholic ex-boxing champion and his relationship with his son.

questions.text: The film documentary 'When We Were Kings' depicts the 1974 championship bout between underdog Muhammad Ali and which heavy weight champion?
questions.explanation:
George Foreman.

	The famous title fight was held in Zaire and became known as 'The Rumble in the Jungle'.

questions.text: Which Elvis Presley film tells the story of a boxer?
questions.explanation:
Kid Galahad.

	This 1962 movie featured Ed Asner's debut and also starred Charles Bronson. It was a remake of a 1937 classic, starring Humphrey Bogart, Bette Davis and Edward G. Robinson.

questions.text: Which 1976 John G. Avildsen directed film had the tag line, 'His whole life was a million-to-one shot.'?
questions.explanation:
Rocky.

	Starring Sylvester Stallone and featuring Carl Weathers and Burgess Meredith, this film quickly became a classic.

questions.text: Who starred as Ali in the movie of the same name?
questions.explanation:
Will Smith.

	Will Smith gave arguably one of his best performances, as the indomitable Cassius Clay, aka Muhammad Ali.

questions.text: What 1972 John Huston film tells the story of two boxers at opposite ends of their careers?
questions.explanation:
Fat City.

	Co-starring Stacey Keach and Jeff Bridges.

questions.text: Who starred as Michael 'Midge' Kelly in the 1949 film 'Champion'?
questions.explanation:
Kirk Douglas.

	This classic drama was directed by Mark Robson.

questions.text: In which 1962 movie did Anthony Quinn star as Mountain Rivera?
questions.explanation:
Requiem For a Heavy Weight.

	This Ralph Nelson directed movie also featured Jackie Gleason and Mickey Rooney.

questions.text: Which boxer was the star of the movie 'The Prize Fighter and the Lady'?
questions.explanation:
Primo Carnera.

	The 1933 film also featured Jack Dempsey.

questions.text: Which Clint Eastwood movie tells the story of a fist fighter and an orangutan?
questions.explanation:
Every Which Way But Loose.

	Clyde, the orangutan, was definitely the star of the show.
